rule: General themes must be listed in a comma-separated format following the label "General themes:".
input: Text: The text encompasses numerous health innovations and economic shifts visible today.
coverage:
Company names: 
People names: 
Specific topics: health innovations, economic shifts
General themes:
validityText:
The input is a text string, fulfilling the first part of the specification. The sentence mentions specific topics such as "health innovations" and "economic shifts," which aligns with the specifications allowing texts to include specific topics and themes. There are no restrictions on length, and the text is coherent and adequately clear for understanding. No parts of the input violate any part of the input specification.

No violation.
OK
